players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "This is terrible! We need to work together here. Does anyone have any information or suspicions we should discuss?"
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
You: "Diana, why did you investigate Charlie? That seems like an odd first choice."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie because he was acting suspiciously in pre-game chat. We must vote him out now before he kills again."

Charlie: "Diana, that's a very bold claim to make so early. If you were really the detective, why would you immediately reveal yourself and make yourself a target? This seems like a desperate mafia play to me."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you choose to investigate Charlie first instead of a more random pick? This feels like a setup."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
